p: Î²-farnesene is one of the essential sesquiterpenes used in the treatment of different types of cancer including breast, lung, and prostate [ 40, 41, 42]. This organic compound is suppressing tumor proliferation through tumor apoptotic pathways. In tumor apoptotic pathway, ROS are formed and induce mitochondrial damage leading to cytochrome c release. The released cytochrome c together with Apaf 1 creates apoptosome that activates caspase cascade to induce cell death [ 43].
